item.title: 如何成为一个优秀的会计
item.description: 正文 I wouldn’t strive to being a good accountant – you need to learn how to become a great accountant. Certifications and educational background are important but those aspects aren’t going to be the reason why you graduate from accountant to senior accountant to manager, etc. I’m a specialist in financial statement preparation, so that’s what I’m going to speak to. Here are three areas that I find are
